content: Personally, I think you should start your own YouTube channel. You could teach lessons- how to do this…. Then you wouldn’t feel so badly when every advertiser wants to put ads on your page for all the people who flock there and you get a bazillion hits. That would be sticking it to “the man” — maybe tell the story of the doctors and the license. Have someone tape it. You could have a million dollars- not by writing, by talking. Or being a movie star, maybe Clint Eastwood. A la “Go ahead, make my day.”
